item.description: stakers/CurveStaker.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Curve Staker Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 37831 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate Callable by owner only. Emit CommitOwnership event with _futureOwner Arguments: _futureOwner: - Future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 38687
